amendment.description: Amendment sought to zero out funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, reduce funding for Nuclear Energy by $691,886,000, and zero out funding for Fossil Energy and to apply the aggregate savings of $2,954,660,000 to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to zero out funding for Energy Efficiency and Renewable Energy, reduce Nuclear Energy by $691,886,000, and zero out funding for Fossil Energy and to apply the aggregate savings of $2,954,660,000 to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 311 (Roll no. 200).

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the McClintock amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 110 - 311 (Roll no. 200).
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. McClintock.
